A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie script should be given to college students as an example of how NOT to write a story.  I enjoy all the fake paid reviews.  They say the same things \"Knocked one of the park!\"  \"Star wars is taking in a bold new direction!\"  Please\, only naive people believe in the fluff reviews.  The audience is fair in saying it deserves a 44%.  I believe that should be lower\, but money buys votes.
